fields.id: As a result of being unable to achieve these outcomes is there, or is there likely to be, a significant impact on your wellbeing?
fields.question: As a result of being unable to achieve these outcomes is there, or is there likely to be, a significant impact on your wellbeing?

fields.id: Details of the impact on your wellbeing (in the absence of any support you may already have in place)
fields.question: Details of the impact on your wellbeing (in the absence of any support you may already have in place)
fields.hint:
The impact on your wellbeing should be looked at disregarding any support you may already have and should take into account the following areas, as well as your (or your representatives) views.
Personal dignity and being treated with respect
Physical and mental health and emotional wellbeing
Protection from abuse and neglect
Suitability of living accommodation
Participation in work, education, training or recreation
Social and economic wellbeing
Domestic, family and personal relationships
Your contribution to society
Control over day-to-day life (including over care and support provided and the way it is provided)
